name: Fear of Colors
description:
A simple platformer game where you aim to go ahead, avoiding colors

Commands:
  • Arrow keys: move
  • Z key: jump
  • X key: dash
  • C key: place checkpoint

Credits:

  • Main character made by o-lobster
  • Game made by Raeino
Note:

Made in 2 days for "Stop waiting for Godot" game jam; learned the Godot game engine by making this game. Turned out a kind of a level 1-1 demo (which is supposed to be way easier than how it is right now) rather than a small game. Might expand this into a full little game in the future, with new levels and mechanics, better visuals and, hopefully, a soundtrack; any suggestion is appreciated.
